parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) can lead to a loss of vehicle control, increased stopping distance, and accidents, especially on slippery or uneven road surfaces.
symptoms: The ABS system fails to engage
the vehicle takes longer to stop
the brakes do not respond as expected
the vehicle continues to roll after applying the brakes
metal-to-metal noise from the rear drums and brake shoes
excessive wear on the rear drums and brake shoes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Cracked welds on the front axle beam can lead to a loss of structural integrity, causing the front suspension to fail, which can result in loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: Vibrations in the front end of the vehicle
uneven tire wear
clunking or rattling noises from the front suspension
difficulty steering
and reduced vehicle stability.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive vibration in the front suspension can cause driver fatigue, reduce vehicle stability, and lead to loss of control, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Vibrations in the front end of the vehicle
shaking or wobbling of the steering wheel
uneven tire wear
and noise from the front suspension.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Improperly mounted tires can cause vibration, loss of control, and increased stopping distances, which can lead to accidents and injuries.
symptoms: Extreme vibration while driving
uneven tire wear
difficulty steering
reduced vehicle stability
and increased risk of tire failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the wiring harness can cause a fire, potentially leading to serious injury or death, as well as damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: The wiring harness is damaged or melted
there is a burning smell or smoke in the vehicle
the electrical system is malfunctioning
the vehicle's lights or accessories are not functioning properly
the vehicle's engine is stalling or not starting.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of headlights while driving can significantly reduce driver visibility, especially at night, increasing the risk of accidents and potentially causing harm to the driver and other road users.
symptoms: Headlights suddenly go out while driving
reduced visibility while driving at night
difficulty seeing the road ahead
increased risk of accidents.
